application.Game

Class EvilExam

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Game.BaseSprite
      • application.Game.EvilExam

  • public class EvilExam
extends BaseSprite
    Evil exam class, used in creating the evil exam sprites This class inherits all members of the base class base sprite and adds unique methods as well.
    Author:
    Nabeel
